headline: Mastercard Incorporated (MA): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Mastercard Incorporated on Value investing subreddit by stockoscope. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MA. Mastercard Incorporated’s share was trading at $543.73 as of January 29th. MA’s trailing and forward P/E were 33.34 and 27.25 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
